001/*

003 * Copyright (c) 2022 rlkraft@pnw.edu
004 * See LICENSE for details.

006
007package renderer.models_LP;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011
012/**
013   Create a wireframe model of a cube with its center
014   at the origin, having edge length 2, and with its
015   corners at {@code (±1, ±1, ±1)}.
016<p>
017   This version of the cube model has each face of
018   the cube cut up by a triangle fan.
019<p>
020   Here is a picture showing how the cube's eight
021   corners are labeled.
022<pre>{@code
023                  v4=(-1,1,-1)
024                  +---------------------+ v5=(1,1,-1)
025                 /|                    /|
026                / |                   / |
027               /  |                  /  |
028              /   |                 /   |
029             /    |                /    |
030         v7 +---------------------+ v6  |
031            |     |               |     |
032            |     |               |     |
033            |     | v0=(-1,-1,-1) |     |
034            |     +---------------|-----+ v1=(1,-1,-1)
035            |    /                |    /
036            |   /                 |   /
037            |  /                  |  /
038            | /                   | /
039            |/                    |/
040            +---------------------+
041            v3=(-1,-1,1)          v2=(1,-1,1)
042}</pre>
043
044   @see Cube
045   @see Cube2
046   @see Cube4
047*/
048public class Cube3 extends Model
049{
050   /**
051      Create a cube with its center at the origin, having edge
052      length 2, with its corners at {@code (±1, ±1, ±1)}. and
053      with a triangle fan of four triangles in each face.
054   */
055   public Cube3( )
056   {
057      this(1, 1, 1);
058   }
059
060
061   /**
062      Create a cube with its center at the origin, having edge
063      length 2, with its corners at {@code (±1, ±1, ±1)}, and
064      with each of the cube's faces containing a triangle fan
065      with the given number of triangles along each of the x,
066      y, and z directions.
067      <p>
068      There must be at least one triangle along each direction.
069
070      @param xCount  number of triangles along the x-direction
071      @param yCount  number of triangles along the y-direction
072      @param zCount  number of triangles along the z-direction
073      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code xCount} is less than 1
074      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code yCount} is less than 1
075      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code zCount} is less than 1
076   */
077   public Cube3(int xCount, int yCount, int zCount)
078   {
079      super( String.format("Cube3(%d,%d,%d)", xCount, yCount, zCount) );
080
081      if (xCount < 1)
082         throw new IllegalArgumentException("xCount must be greater than or equal to 1");
083      if (yCount < 1)
084         throw new IllegalArgumentException("yCount must be greater than or equal to 1");
085      if (zCount < 1)
086         throw new IllegalArgumentException("zCount must be greater than or equal to 1");
087
088      final double xStep = 2.0 / xCount,
089                   yStep = 2.0 / yCount,
090                   zStep = 2.0 / zCount;
091
092      // We need six LineFan primitives, one for each face of the cube.
093      Primitive bottomFan = new LineFan();
094      Primitive    topFan = new LineFan();
095      Primitive   backFan = new LineFan();
096      Primitive  frontFan = new LineFan();
097      Primitive   leftFan = new LineFan();
098      Primitive  rightFan = new LineFan();
099      // Each line fan begins with a vertex at the center of its face.
100      addVertex(new Vertex( 0, -1,  0),   // center bottom
101                new Vertex( 0,  1,  0),   // center top
102                new Vertex( 0,  0, -1),   // center back
103                new Vertex( 0,  0,  1),   // center front
104                new Vertex(-1,  0,  0),   // center feft
105                new Vertex( 1,  0,  0));  // center right
106      bottomFan.addIndex(0);
107         topFan.addIndex(1);
108        backFan.addIndex(2);
109       frontFan.addIndex(3);
110        leftFan.addIndex(4);
111       rightFan.addIndex(5);
112
113      // A counter of vertices in the vertex list.
114      int index = 6;
115
116      // All the vertices around the bottom face.
117      double x = -1.0;
118      for (int i = 0; i < xCount; ++i)
119      {
120         addVertex(new Vertex(x, -1, -1));
121         x += xStep;
122         bottomFan.addIndex(index);
123           backFan.addIndex(index);
124         index++;
125      }
126      double z = -1.0;
127      for (int i = 0; i < zCount; ++i)
128      {
129         addVertex(new Vertex(1, -1, z));
130         z += zStep;
131         bottomFan.addIndex(index);
132          rightFan.addIndex(index);
133         index++;
134      }
135      x = 1.0;
136      for (int i = 0; i < xCount; ++i)
137      {
138         addVertex(new Vertex(x, -1, 1));
139         x -= xStep;
140         bottomFan.addIndex(index);
141           frontFan.addIndex(index);
142         index++;
143      }
144      z = 1.0;
145      for (int i = 0; i < zCount; ++i)
146      {
147         addVertex(new Vertex(-1, -1, z));
148         z -= zStep;
149         bottomFan.addIndex(index);
150           leftFan.addIndex(index);
151         index++;
152      }
153
154      // All the vertices around the top face
155      x = -1.0;
156      for (int i = 0; i < xCount; ++i)
157      {
158         addVertex(new Vertex(x, 1, -1));
159         x += xStep;
160          topFan.addIndex(index);
161         backFan.addIndex(index);
162         index++;
163      }
164      z = -1.0;
165      for (int i = 0; i < zCount; ++i)
166      {
167         addVertex(new Vertex(1, 1, z));
168         z += zStep;
169           topFan.addIndex(index);
170         rightFan.addIndex(index);
171         index++;
172      }
173      x = 1.0;
174      for (int i = 0; i < xCount; ++i)
175      {
176         addVertex(new Vertex(x, 1, 1));
177         x -= xStep;
178           topFan.addIndex(index);
179         frontFan.addIndex(index);
180         index++;
181      }
182      z = 1.0;
183      for (int i = 0; i < zCount; ++i)
184      {
185         addVertex(new Vertex(-1, 1, z));
186         z -= zStep;
187          topFan.addIndex(index);
188         leftFan.addIndex(index);
189         index++;
190      }
191
192      // The vertices for the four vertical edges.
193      double y = -1.0;
194      for (int i = 1; i < yCount; ++i)
195      {
196         y += yStep;
197         addVertex(new Vertex(-1, y, -1));
198         backFan.addIndex(index);
199         leftFan.addIndex(index);
200         index++;
201      }
202      y = -1.0;
203      for (int i = 1; i < yCount; ++i)
204      {
205         y += yStep;
206         addVertex(new Vertex(1, y, -1));
207          backFan.addIndex(index);
208         rightFan.addIndex(index);
209         index++;
210      }
211      y = -1.0;
212      for (int i = 1; i < yCount; ++i)
213      {
214         y += yStep;
215         addVertex(new Vertex(1, y, 1));
216         frontFan.addIndex(index);
217         rightFan.addIndex(index);
218         index++;
219      }
220      y = -1.0;
221      for (int i = 1; i < yCount; ++i)
222      {
223         y += yStep;
224         addVertex(new Vertex(-1, y, 1));
225         frontFan.addIndex(index);
226          leftFan.addIndex(index);
227         index++;
228      }
229
230      // Line loop around the bottom face.
231      addPrimitive(new LineLoop(6,
232                                6 + xCount,
233                                6 + xCount+zCount,
234                                6 + 2*xCount+zCount));
235      // line loop around the top face.
236      addPrimitive(new LineLoop(6 + 2*xCount+2*zCount,
237                                6 + 3*xCount+2*zCount,
238                                6 + 3*xCount+3*zCount,
239                                6 + 4*xCount+3*zCount));
240      // Four vertical edges.
241      addPrimitive(new Lines(6,                   6 + 2*xCount+2*zCount,
242                             6 + xCount,          6 + 3*xCount+2*zCount,
243                             6 + xCount+zCount,   6 + 3*xCount+2*zCount,
244                             6 + 2*xCount+zCount, 6 + 4*xCount+3*zCount));
245
246      addPrimitive(bottomFan,
247                      topFan,
248                     backFan,
249                    frontFan,
250                     leftFan,
251                    rightFan);
252   }
253}//Cube3
